titles.title: Fund and Complete the Border Wall Act
Fund and Complete the Border Wall Act
To establish a separate account in the Treasury to hold deposits to be used to secure the southern border of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, the Judiciary, Foreign Affairs, Financial Services, Education and Workforce, and Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
